channel.title: Python on Nguyen Hoang Trung
channel.description: Recent content in Python on Nguyen Hoang Trung

item.title: RITSEC18 Freeze
item.description: It’s clearly a python compiled program since there is a libpython and also, when using decompiler, there was a function name PyDontWriteByteCode using ‘pyi-archive-viewer’ we can extract the main function. Append headers to the file "\x03\xf3\x0d\x0a\xf1\x32\x75\x5a" using uncompyle, we can get the main function. Change the key a little bit Â±k*360 and we will get the flag.
